backend/main.mo: Defines a Motoko canister with authorization, storage mixins, and many theme, layout, and content-related types for the hero section, social media links, clinics, and services.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and key behaviors of various frontend components and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style definitions with light and dark theme CSS variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file initializing the app and loading the main React entry script.
frontend/src/.well-known/ic-domains: Domain configuration file specifying the project's IC domain.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, admin panel toggling, hash-based routing, and rendering home or blogs views.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section fetching content and credentials with skeleton loading, error handling, admin editing, and animated Material Design styling.
frontend/src/components/admin/ClinicsMan: Admin interface for creating, editing, and deleting clinics with image upload support.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContentMan: Admin tool for managing website images and hero section content, including file uploads and edits.
frontend/src/components/admin/HeroThemeM: Loads, edits, and saves hero section theme settings with multiple update handlers and UI controls.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReviewsMan: Manages reviews and panel settings, supporting add, edit, delete, image upload, and guarded submissions.
frontend/src/components/admin/ServicesMa: CRUD interface for services with a dialog form for adding and editing service entries.
frontend/src/components/admin/SocialMedi: Manages social media links with add, edit, delete, visibility toggles, and ordering.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Provides an admin panel with tabbed navigation to manage content, themes, clinics, services, reviews, and social media.
frontend/src/components/blogs/BlogDetail: Displays a full blog post with metadata, rich content rendering, and admin edit support.
frontend/src/components/blogs/BlogList.t: Lists blog posts with previews, sorting, admin edit/delete actions, and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/blogs/BlogPostEd: Dialog component for creating or editing blog posts with text/image blocks, upload handling, and save logic.
frontend/src/components/blogs/RichConten: Renders rich blog content including HTML text, plain text, images, and videos based on element type.
frontend/src/components/blogs/RichTextEd: Custom rich text editor using contentEditable with formatting toolbar for headings, styles, lists, and links.
frontend/src/components/BlogsPage.tsx: Displays blog posts with list and detail views, supports admin creation and editing, and shows loading or empty states.
frontend/src/components/Clinics.tsx: Fetches and displays clinic listings with loading and error states, hiding content when empty for non-admins.
frontend/src/components/DoctorCredential: Shows a doctor's credentials with editable fields and profile image when admin access is available.
Provides inline editable text fields for website content with admin controls and save/cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/EditableFooterCo: Allows admins to edit footer fields like contact info or copyright with inline editing UI.
frontend/src/components/EditableHeroCont: Enables admin editing of hero section text and button settings via a dialog interface.
frontend/src/components/EditableImage.ts: Component that displays an image and allows admins to upload or update standard and darkâ€‘mode images with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer that loads contact info, quick links, and social media links, with admin editing and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, theme toggle, authentication handling, and support for mobile menu and admin panel toggling.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section that loads dynamic content, background images, and theme/layout settings with admin editing and visual effects.
frontend/src/components/hero/effects/Mot: Canvas-based animated motion effects such as waves or floating gradients based on configuration.
frontend/src/components/hero/effects/Par: Canvas particle animation layer rendering bubbles, sparkles, or confetti with motion and fading.
frontend/src/components/hero/effects/Vec: SVG-based vector animations rendering geometric patterns or animated paths driven by config.
frontend/src/components/hero/FloatingMed: Empty placeholder file for a floating medical icons visual layer.
frontend/src/components/hero/HeroMultiEf: Combines and renders particle, motion, and vector hero effects when enabled.
frontend/src/components/hero/HeroSpecial: Empty placeholder file for special hero visual effects.
frontend/src/components/Overview.tsx: Overview section showing highlight cards and editable text, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their name using a profile creation mutation.
frontend/src/components/Reviews.tsx: Displays user reviews with optional carousel behavior, auto-scrolling, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Fetches and displays service cards with loading, error handling, and admin-aware visibility.
frontend/src/components/SocialMedia.tsx: Shows social media links with platform-specific icons, gradients, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeroLayoutPreset.t: Analyzes a hero image to derive a layout preset and returns reactive layout config with fallback defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as user profiles, content, and clinics using the actor.
frontend/src/ic-assets.json: Configures asset rules allowing inclusion of .well-known files.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers and custom light/dark mode design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/heroImageAnalysis.ts: Implements client-side image analysis to compute brightness, contrast, weight distribution, and busyness for layout decisions.
frontend/src/utils/heroThemeDefaults.ts: Utility functions for validating, clamping, and normalizing hero theme settings, including dimensions, positioning, and visual effect parameters.
frontend/src/utils/particleEffectTypes.t: Defines metadata for particle effect types and provides helpers to get human-readable labels and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, spacing, radii, and shadows, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing current project state, feature requirements, issues, and planned enhancements.
